name: allip-mpmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of allip-mpmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of allip-mpmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Create a heroic fantasy concept art in a painterly collection style that captures the medieval fantasy essence without the introduction of modern tech or signage. Illustrate the creature known as allip-mpmm from tabletop fantasy, showcasing its musculature and unique limbs, contrasted against a human silhouette. The scene is set in a merged zone of the sky and underwater; showcasing elements of motion, aquatic fantasy, and subsurface caustics. The creature and surroundings glow with bioluminescent accents, hinting at the pressure-dome materials used in this landscape. Use a palette of teals, deep blues, sea-greens and pearl highlights to evoke the sense of underwater depth. The aim is to maintain a consistent stylistic realism without venturing into photoreal CGI or anime style, and avoid unnecessary artifacts, embedded text, gibberish strings, modern signage, or sci-fi UIs.
